section.heading: Participation in cost of emergency overnight shelter.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Mar. 6, 1991, D.C. Law 8-197, § 2(g), 37 DCR 4815

annoGroup.heading: Temporary Amendment of Section
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (225 day) amendment of section, see § 3 of Human Services Spending Reduction Temporary Amendment Act of 1995 (D.C. Law 11-29, July 25, 1995, law notification 42 DCR 4002).

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary amendment of section, see § 3 of the Human Services Spending Reduction Emergency Amendment Act of 1995 (D.C. Act 11-35, April 11, 1995, 42 DCR 1834) and § 3 of the Human Services Spending Reduction Congressional Recess Emergency Amendment Act of 1995 (D.C. Act 11-104, July 21, 1995, 42 DCR 4014).
For temporary amendment of section, see § 504 of the Omnibus Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 1995 (D.C. Act 11-124, July 27, 1995, 42 DCR 4160).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: “Be” was inserted in the third sentence of (a) to correct an error in D.C. Law 8-197.
